short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generate comments for LinkedIn posts using OpenAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The LinkedIn AI Assistant is a Chrome extension designed to help professionals and businesses engage effectively on LinkedIn. It generates personalized comments to improve interactions on the platform. This tool is primarily aimed at individuals who want to increase their LinkedIn presence while saving time. Our service is ethical, user-friendly, and compliant with LinkedIn’s terms.

Our service uses a simple system:
• When users install the service, they get 5 free credits to try it out—no credit card required. These credits let them generate comments using AI.
• After using the free credits, users can make a one-time purchase of $14, which includes 1,000 bonus credits.
• Once the 1,000 credits are used up, users can buy more credits from the bellow packages:
  • $9 for 8,000 credits.
  • $40 for 40,000 credits.
• Each comment uses approximately 1 credit using GPT-3.5 Turbo and 10 credits using GPT-4.
• Free future update for life time.
